answers.answer: Interesting...how does the download work, do you have a usb cable or something?Are you downloading in excel format, or does it download as a csv file?
I use a USB cable.  It downloads as a .xls file.

question: My glucometer allows me to download the past 500 glucose tests I've taken to an excel document.  Can I, now or in future, import that information directly to my diabetes tracker so I can have a broader data stream to better understand my stats?
title: Diabetes Tracker Info Import
